Kgalagadi Transfrontier Park.title: Kgalagadi Transfrontier Park
Kgalagadi Transfrontier Park.byline: The Kgalagadi Transfrontier Park (Botswana and South Africa) is in the Kalahari regions of Botswana and South Africa, and came into being as the merger of the Gemsbok National Park in Botswana and the Kalahari Gemsbok National Park in South Africa.
